name: Infinite Dungeon Dive
description:
For the Extra Credits Game Jam. Inspired by Enter the Gungeon and Etrian Mystery Dungeon. I got a little ambitious and planned something too large, so this is ultimately unfinished, but playable.

WASD movement, click to shoot. Tutorial in game for anything else.

If you see any bugs, obvious mistakes, or general suggestions, please leave a comment, as I am still working on this game.

POST JAM UPDATES (download link should contain jam version. best at 800x600)

UPDATE 8/20/18
- minimap bug fix
- enemies no longer appear directly at door when loading new room
- player flinches when damaged
- rolling evades all damage
- added some sounds

UPDATE 8/25/18
- found out performance drops around floor 30, so working on grouping rooms into chunks to reduce number of GameObjects.

Planned features that I didn't get to (in order of priority):
- refactoring/bug fixes to transition from 48hr jam mode to full dev mode
- multiple enemy types (including minibosses)
- click sentry on minimap to teleport
- power-ups
- special rooms, like shops

github: https://github.com/Origamijr/ECGameJam2018
